title: "Artificial Intelligence Is Helping to Spot California Wildfires"
excerpt: "Massive amounts of video and image data from mountaintop cameras and satellites is being analyzed by artificial intelligence to spot dangerous wildfires. For decades, this work relied on human lookouts with binoculars."
